description: Overlooking the piazza for almost 50 years, this restaurant has been modernised but has nonetheless managed to retain its friendly, no - frills appeal. The walls are decorated with paintings by the chef, who serves up regional gastronomic creations reinterpreted with a contemporary twist.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
